content: the gentle breeze hat is knit in the round from the bottom up with dk-weight merino wool the design features a combination of ribbing and simple cables the pattern is an 8-round repeat the hat is very stretchy the folded brim is knit in 2×2 rib the crown decreases are done in the last 7 rounds and the top of the hat has a gathered look and it stands up from the head a bit
